member.summary: A custom processor to extract model collision data.

member.name: T:Nine.Content.Pipeline.Processors.NormalTextureProcessor
member.summary: The NormalMapTextureProcessor takes in an encoded normal map, and outputs a texture in the NormalizedByte4 format. Every pixel in the source texture is remapped so that values ranging from 0 to 1 will range from -1 to 1.

member.name: T:Nine.Content.Pipeline.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Nine.Content.Pipeline.Properties.Resources.FragmentParserParameterBlockTypeExpected

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unexpected character: '{0}'..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Data type (bool, int, int2, int3, int4, intNxM, float, float2, float3, float4, floatNxM, matrix, Texture1D, Texture2D, Texture3D, TextureCube) expected..

member.name: P:Nine.Content.Pipeline.Properties.Resources.ParserInitialValueUnexpected
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Initial value was not expected for this type of parameter block..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Shader profile '{0}' is not supported. Only 2_0 and 3_0 are supported..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Syntax error: '{0}' expected..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Syntax error: '{0}' unexpected..

member.name: T:Nine.Content.Pipeline.Graphics.TextureAtlasContent
member.summary: Build-time type used to hold the output data from the SpriteSheetProcessor. This is saved into XNB format by the SpriteSheetWriter helper class, then at runtime, the SpriteSheetReader loads the data into a SpriteSheet object.

member.summary: Tells the content pipeline what CLR type the sprite sheet data will be loaded into at runtime.

member.name: T:Nine.Content.Pipeline.Processors.SpritePacker
member.summary: Helper for arranging many small sprites into a single larger sheet.

member.name: M:Nine.Content.Pipeline.Processors.SpritePacker.PackSprites(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.Pipeline.Graphics.BitmapContent},System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Rectangle},Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.Pipeline.ContentProcessorContext)
member.summary: Packs a list of sprites into a single big texture, recording where each one was stored.
Once the arranging is complete, copies the bitmap data for each sprite to its chosen position in the single larger output bitmap.
